title: I built a Gaming PC for DUMMIES
description: Thank you to Lenovo and Xbox Game Pass for sponsoring this video! More on the Lenovo Legion 5 Pro:  Get it from Micro Center:  Costco:  ANTonline:   Building a gaming PC sure isn't like it was in 2009 but thanks to my how to build a PC for dummies book and DVD I'm ready to enter the next generation of games.  Subscribe!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:
